title: Longevity and efficacy of lanthanum-based P remediation under changing dissolved oxygen availability in a small eutrophic lake
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EM00572K, Paper
Wessam Neweshy, Dolors Planas, Nicole Sanderson, Raoul-Marie Couture
Seasonal porewater dynamics in a lanthanum-remediated lake reveal that phosphorus mobility remains sensitive to redox conditions during its burial.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
